description: This promptware is used to turn a few words into a restaurant review.
creator: OpenAI

restaurant_review_creator.name: restaurant_review_creator
restaurant_review_creator.description: This promptware is used to turn a few words into a restaurant review.
restaurant_review_creator.instruction: Write a restaurant review based on these notes:

input.text:
Name: The Blue Wharf
Lobster great, noisy, service polite, prices good.

Review:

example.output: I recently visited The Blue Wharf for dinner and had a great experience. The lobster was especially delicious - definitely the highlight of the meal. The only downside was that it was a bit noisy, but the polite service more than made up for it. Prices were also very reasonable, making it a great value overall.

example_prompt:
Write a restaurant review based on these notes:



Name: The Blue Wharf
Lobster great, noisy, service polite, prices good.

Review:
